title: Displaying IDA names in x64dbg or OllyDbg
content: I like x64dbg, but, without seeing IDA's names, it's hard to keep track of all the hex. Is there any way to export IDA's names into x64dbg (ideally contiuously)

comments.text: There are plugins to sync the IDA view with x64dbg - github.com/quarkslab/qb-sync, github.com/tmr232/ret-sync
why not just debug in IDA?

answers_data.content: The plugin labeless (https://github.com/a1ext/labeless) was created for exactly this purpose. You can now also use x64dbgida (https://github.com/x64dbg/x64dbgida) to import/export x64dbg databases.
